entry.title: Purple Grape Collagen Powder - 560g
entry.summary:
Vendor: thecollagen.co
Type:
Price: 79.00

Description

Bursting with the juicy, vibrant taste of fresh purple grapes, it’s the perfect refreshment to energise your day while supporting your glow goals. Packed with powerful beauty benefits, this collagen powder is more than a drink—it’s your daily boost for radiant skin, strong nails, healthy hair, and happy joints!

Benefits

Consider all your beauty and wellness needs taken care of. 

With 15 grams of heavy-hitting Hydrolysed Bovine Collagen Peptides per serving, our collagen powder — pure, 100% grass-fed, and pasture-raised — is not here to mess around. 

Scientifically formulated for fast absorption, our Premium Collagen Peptides work quickly to support hair, nail, and skin health; improve joint function; and nourish the gut.

Other youth-preserving ingredients include: 

  • Vitamin C (adored for its ability to boost natural collagen production)
  • Hyaluronic Acid (a humectant that attracts and retains moisture for joint lubrication and plumped-up skin)
  • Biotin (a B vitamin crucial for energy production and, thus, healthy hair, skin, and nails)

Ingredients

  • 100% Hydrolysed Collagen Peptides (Bovine)

Hydrolyzed bioactive collagen from grass-fed, pasture-raised bovine. A tailored blend that stimulates type 1, type 2 and type 3 collagen. Combined, these promote healthy hair, skin and nails, improve joint function and support gut health.

  • Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C)

Essential for collagen biosynthesis and the formation of collagen fibres. Vitamin C is also a powerful antioxidant that boosts the immune system and helps the body absorb iron. 

  • Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid)

A polysaccharide that occurs naturally in your skin. Hyaluronic Acid acts like a tiny sponge that pulls in water to quench and plump skin–giving it that dewy, glowy effect. It also keeps the joints lubricated and helps preserve bone strength.

  • Biotin  (Vitamin B7)

An essential B vitamin that assists skin, hair and nail health. Biotin also helps the body convert food into energy by supporting enzymes involved in the breakdown of carbs, fats and proteins. 

  • Erythritol, Natural Flavours, Malic Acid, Citric Acid, Natural Colour (Red Beetroot Extract), Natural Sweetener (Thaumatin).

Nutrition Information

Amino Acid Profile

How to Use

How to enjoy it?
Add 1 serving (2 heaped scoops) to 400ml hot or cold water, fruit or your favourite smoothie and mix well. Adding the powder first helps the collagen powder to mix in better.

How many serves a day?
How much collagen you should take each day depends on your own health goals. Between 15-30grams of collagen peptides a day will give you visible results.

One serve a day is ideal if you want to combat fine lines and wrinkles, improve your hair and nail strength, ease joint pain, build muscle, improve gut health and get an overall energy boost.

Two serves a day will fast track your results. Have one serve morning and evening.

Storage: Store in a cool, dark place out of direct sunlight.

Common FAQs

Is collagen safe for pregnant and nursing mothers?

Yes, our collagen is perfectly safe for both pregnant and nursing mothers. In fact, there are many benefits of taking collagen whilst pregnant. Many of our customers have already experienced the benefits with skin elasticity, minimising the appearance of stretch marks and getting a radiant glow. Additionally, it promotes strong and healthy hair, already helping our customers to combat postpartum hair loss.

For any specific concerns, we recommend consulting with your general practitioner, who can provide personalised advice tailored to your needs.

How many serves per pack?

Each tin provides 28 servings, equivalent to 56 scoops, ensuring long-lasting use. If you consume once per day it will last you 28 days. Prepare to be amazed as each serving contains an impressive 15 grams of collagen, complemented by the benefits of Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin C, and Biotin. This comprehensive blend offers everything you need to enhance your beauty regimen, providing nourishment and support for radiant skin, hair, and nails, joints and gut health.

How much sugar per serve?

Indulge guilt-free in our Premium Collagen Peptides and our entire product range, as each serving is thoughtfully crafted to contain minimal to no sugar. Enjoy the delicious flavours of our Premium Collagen Peptides, knowing that each one contains less than 1g of sugar per serving, allowing you to prioritise your health and wellness without sacrificing taste.

entry.title: Purple Grape Collagen Sachets - 280g
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Collagen Co.
Type:
Price: 49.00

 

Description

Introducing your new beauty and wellness essential—now with the refreshing taste of Purple Grape.

We've combined all the anti-aging ingredients you need to glow from within—Hydrolysed Bovine Collagen Powder, Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, and Biotin—into one easy-to-use sachet. It's the ultimate in convenience, providing everything your skin, hair, nails, joints, and gut need in a single step.

Benefits

How can one sachet cover all your beauty and wellness needs? It starts with 15 grams of 100% pure, grass-fed, pasture-raised Hydrolysed Bovine Collagen Peptides.

These bioavailable collagen peptides are quickly absorbed by your body, where they help promote firmer, smoother skin, shinier hair and nails, stronger joints, and a more balanced gut microbiome.

Plus, Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, and Biotin work together to amplify these effects:

  • Vitamin C: A powerful antioxidant that brightens skin, firms the complexion, and evens out skin tone
  • Hyaluronic Acid: Known for its moisture-binding properties, it helps keep joints lubricated and skin hydrated
  • Biotin: Supports energy production while promoting healthy hair, skin, and nails

Ingredients

  • 100% Hydrolysed Collagen Peptides (Bovine)
    Bioactive collagen from grass-fed, pasture-raised bovine, designed to stimulate type 1, type 2, and type 3 collagen. These promote healthy hair, skin, and nails, improve joint function, and support gut health.
  • Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C)
    Crucial for collagen formation, this antioxidant boosts your immune system and aids iron absorption.
  • Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid)
    Naturally occurring in your skin, this ingredient attracts moisture to hydrate and plump your skin while also lubricating joints and preserving bone health.
  • Biotin (Vitamin B7)
    Vital for healthy hair, skin, and nails. Biotin also supports the conversion of food into energy.
  • Erythritol, Natural Flavours, Malic Acid, Citric Acid, Natural Colour (Red Beetroot Extract, Turmeric Powder), Natural Sweetener (Thaumatin)

 

Nutrition Information


Amino Acid Profile

How to Use

How to enjoy it?
Simply add 1 sachet to 400ml of hot or cold water, fruit, or your favourite smoothie, and mix well. To get the best blend, add the powder first before mixing.

How many serves a day?
Your daily collagen needs depend on your wellness goals. For noticeable results, aim for 15–30 grams of collagen peptides daily.

  • One serve a day is ideal for targeting fine lines, boosting hair and nail strength, easing joint discomfort, supporting muscle growth, improving gut health, and giving you an energy boost.
  • Two serves a day will accelerate results. Take one in the morning and one in the evening.

Storage:
Store in a cool, dark place away from direct sunlight.

Common FAQs

Is collagen safe for pregnant and nursing mothers?
Yes! Our collagen is safe for both pregnant and nursing mothers. It can help improve skin elasticity, reduce the appearance of stretch marks, and promote a healthy glow. Many of our customers also find it beneficial for combatting postpartum hair loss. If you have any concerns, we recommend consulting your doctor for personalised advice.

How many serves per pack?
Each box contains 14 convenient sachets, offering 14 servings. If you take one sachet per day, your pack will last for two weeks, giving you 15 grams of collagen, plus Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, and Biotin—everything you need for a complete beauty and wellness routine.

How much sugar per serve?
Enjoy our Purple Grape Collagen Peptides guilt-free, as each serving contains less than 1g of sugar. Taste the goodness without compromising on your health and wellness goals!

entry.title: Iced Coffee Collagen Meal Replacement - 784g
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Collagen Co.
Type:
Price: 79.00

Description

Enjoy our new iced coffee flavour, boasting a harmonious blend of rich, roasted notes and creamy undertones. Infused with functional ingredients, it not only delights your taste buds but also supports your weight, beauty, and wellness goals.

Our Glow Shakes are hard workers. Every serving has

  • 29+ grams of hunger-curbing protein (includes 17.5 grams of glow-giving Hydrolysed Collagen Peptides!)
  • 5+ grams of gut-nurturing Prebiotic Fiber
  • Fat-burning MCT Oil
  • 24 Vitamins and Minerals
  • Scoop included

Benefits

Achieve your weight management, beauty, and wellness goals with fewer calories.

Our Glow Shakes are low in sugar (less than 1 gram per serving!) and carbs (half of what's in other meal replacements!), yet packed with ingredients that keep you satisfied and promote a radiant complexion.

With over 29 grams of protein to keep you full until your next meal, including 17.5 grams from anti-aging Hydrolyzed Collagen Peptides, your skin, hair, and nails will thank you.

There’s also:

  • 5+ grams of Prebiotic Fiber to aid digestion
  • MCT Oil to increase fat burn
  • A buffet of 24 Vitamins and Minerals for optimal well-being

Ingredients

  • 100% Hydrolysed Collagen Peptides (Bovine)

This bioavailable form of collagen is highly digestible with enhanced absorption, allowing it to effectively support healthy skin, hair, nails, joints and overall health and wellness. For results you can truly see and feel.

  • Whey Protein Isolate & Milk Protein Isolate

These premium protein sources support satiety, aid weight management, promote muscle recovery and growth, and provide essential amino acids for strength and vitality, helping you achieve your fitness goals while feeling satisfied and nourished.

  • MCT Oil 

Known for its quick energy release, it supports weight management goals, enhances cognitive function and mental clarity, boosts endurance during physical activities, aids in appetite control, and promotes a feeling of sustained energy throughout the day, empowering you to achieve your best self.

    • Prebiotic Fibre 

    By providing nourishment for beneficial gut bacteria, it promotes a healthy digestive system, improves nutrient absorption, aids in regular bowel movements, supports a balanced microbiome, enhances immune function, and helps maintain stable blood sugar levels for overall well-being.

    • 24 Vitamins & Minerals

    Vitamins:
    Vitamin A, Thiamin (B1), Riboflavin (B2), Niacinimide (B3), Pantothenic Acid (B5), Vitamin B6, Biotin (B7), Folate (B9), Vitamin (B12), Vitamin C, Vitamin D, Vitamin E

    Minerals:
    Calcium, Chromium, Copper, Iodine, Iron, Magnesium, Manganese, Molybdenum, Phosphorous, Potassium, Selenium, Zinc

    • Natural Coffee Powder, Natural Flavours, Erythritol, Thickeners (Guar Gum, Xanthan Gum, Acacia Gum), Natural Colour (Red Beetroot Extract), Sea Salt, Natural Sweetener (Thaumatin), Sunflower Lecithin

    Nutrition Information

     

    Amino Acid Profile

    *Essential amino acids natural variations may occur

    How to Use

    How to enjoy it?
    Mix/Blend with 350ml of chilled water and shake or blend well. For extra flavour and creaminess, you can also substitute water for your favourite milk or milk alternative.

    How many serves a day?
    Replace up to 2 meals per day with your Glow Shakes along with a nutritious balanced diet. Discover the simplicity and effectiveness of a two shakes a day meal plan with our carefully crafted example below.

    Be sure to check out our newly created Weight Loss Hub

    Here, you'll find meal plans, top tips to lose weight and keep it off, and easy workouts to follow. It's a great resource to help you stay on track and achieve your goals.

    Storage: Store in a cool, dark place out of direct sunlight.

    Common FAQ's

    How many meals per pack?

    Each pack contains 14 meals/shakes, each of which provides more than 29 grams of satiating protein. Additionally, they include MCT Oil to increase your energy levels and metabolism, along with Prebiotic Fibre and a comprehensive blend of 24 vitamins and minerals to support your daily micronutrient requirements.

    Can I have Glow Shakes and Premium Collagen Peptides on the same day?

    Certainly, you can decide whether to continue using either the Premium Collagen Peptides and Glow Shakes together or opt for solely the Glow Shakes. The choice is entirely yours, depending on your personal preference and the results you aim to achieve.

    Combining both products can offer you an additional glowing boost and enhance your results.

    How much carbs and sugar per serve?

    Each serving of Glow Shakes contains less than 7 grams of carbs and less than 1 gram of sugar, making them an ideal choice for those conscious of their carbohydrate and sugar intake.

    The combination of low carbohydrates and virtually no added sugar in Glow Shakes not only helps you manage your daily sugar intake but also supports your overall health and wellness goals. Whether you're following a low-carb diet, watching your sugar intake, or simply seeking a healthier meal replacement option, Glow Shakes offer a convenient and nutritious solution.

    How much caffeine in Iced Coffee Glow Shakes per serve?

    Each serving of Iced Coffee Glow Shakes contains 120mg of caffeine from natural coffee - the perfect on-the-go breakfast for an extra boost of energy.

entry.title: Unflavoured Beauty Marine Collagen Powder - 284g
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Collagen Co.
Type:
Price: 79.00

Description

Marine collagen peptides, but not the ones you know. Because we make ours from fish scales — these contain the most collagen content among fish parts without that undesirable fishy smell and taste. And it's not just any fish scales. But instead, wild-caught ones off Australia's pristine coastal waters. Your skin, hair, nails, joints, and gut are in for a treat.

Beyond its versatility, the Unflavoured Beauty Marine Collagen Powder boasts exceptional efficacy. This is attributed to its carefully calibrated blend featuring abundant doses of Hydrolysed Marine Collagen Powder, Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, and Niacinamide.

This powerful combination is dedicated to enhancing the radiance of your hair, skin, nails, joints, and gut. With this potent blend at work, premature ageing can be effectively prevented.

Benefits

Not your typical 3-gram-per-serving marine collagen powder. Fueled by 10 grams of 100% pure Marine Collagen Peptides per serving, Beauty Marine Collagen is on a mission to illuminate, plump, hydrate, and restore; all in one. As with all our products, our marine collagen peptides are thoughtfully broken down until they're digestion-bypassing-tiny (a molecular size of less than 2 kDa on average).

Finally: they’re packed with Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, and Niacinamide:

  • Vitamin C shields your skin from free radicals
  • Hyaluronic Acid binds water for a firm complexion and well-lubricated joints
  • Niacinamide helps to maintain skin moisture and strengthen the skin barrier.

So, why settle for the rest when you can have the best?

Ingredients

  • 100% Pure Marine Collagen Peptides

10,000mg of Hydrolysed Marine Collagen Peptides created from sustainably sourced, wild caught fish scales from the coastal waters of Australia. With an average molecular weight of less than 2kDa, our PUREACOL MARINE™ Collagen Peptides are designed for optimum absorption and bioavailability.

  • Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C)

Essential for collagen biosynthesis and the formation of collagen fibres. Vitamin C is also a powerful antioxidant that boosts the immune system and helps the body absorb iron. 

  • Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid)

A polysaccharide that occurs naturally in your skin. Hyaluronic Acid acts like a tiny sponge that pulls in water to quench and plump skin–giving it that dewy, glowy effect. It also keeps the joints lubricated and helps preserve bone strength.

  • Vitamin B3 (Niacinamide)

Aids in retaining skin moisture, fortifying the skin barrier, and reducing inflammation of the skin, commonly caused by skin conditions such as eczema and rosacea.

Nutrition Information

How to Use

How to enjoy it?
Add 1 serving (2 scoops) to coffee, tea, oats or your favourite smoothie on the daily. Adding the powder first helps the collagen powder to mix in better. Can also be baked into cakes or biscuits for a delicious collagen snack.

How many serves a day?
How much collagen you should take each day depends on your own health goals. Between 10-30grams of collagen peptides a day will give you visible results.

One serve a day is ideal if you want to combat fine lines and wrinkles, improve your hair and nail strength, ease joint pain, build muscle, improve gut health and get an overall energy boost.

Two serves a day will fast track your results. Have one serve morning and evening.

Storage: Store in a cool, dark place out of direct sunlight.

Common FAQs

Is collagen safe for pregnant and nursing mothers?

Yes, our collagen is perfectly safe for both pregnant and nursing mothers. In fact, there are many benefits of taking collagen whilst pregnant. Many of our customers have already experienced the benefits with skin elasticity, minimising the appearance of stretch marks and getting a radiant glow. Additionally, it promotes strong and healthy hair, already helping our customers to combat postpartum hair loss.

For any specific concerns, we recommend consulting with your general practitioner, who can provide personalised advice tailored to your needs.

How many serves per pack?

Experience the glow with our Beauty Marine Collagen, featuring 28 serves, allowing you to radiate with beauty. Each serve packs a remarkable 10,000mg of pure Australian marine collagen, Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, and Niacinamide, ensuring you receive a generous dose of its nourishing benefits with every serving. 

What’s the difference between Beauty Marine Collagen and Premium Collagen Peptides?

If you're contemplating which option suits you best, the decision ultimately boils down to your dietary preferences. Premium Collagen Peptides harness the power of hydrolyzed bovine collagen, stimulating the production of type 1, 2, and 3 collagens in the body. On the other hand, Beauty Marine Collagen utilises Pure Australian marine collagen, which contains type 1 collagen.

Rest assured, both options deliver radiant skin, lustrous hair, strong nails, and provide support for joint and gut health.

entry.title: Immunity Collagen Peptides - Elderberry & Raspberry 208g
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Collagen Co.
Type:
Price: 45.00

 

 

Description

Equal parts tasty and effective. Our Immunity Collagen Peptides blends a wealth of vital, immunity-boosting nutrients to help Protect Your Glow. 

Beyond our hero ingredient, Hydrolysed Bovine Collagen Powder, there’s also Vitamin C, Vitamin A, Zinc, and Vitamin D. Ahh, just reading that made us feel sprightlier and better prepared for the stressful demands of modern life.

Benefits

Let's count the ways our Immunity Collagen Peptides lends a helping hand to your immune system:

  • One, 10 grams of 100% pure, grass-fed, pasture-raised Hydrolysed Bovine Collagen Peptides keep your skin — i.e., the first line of defence against bugs and infections — in tip-top condition. 
  • Two, the synergistic blend of Vitamin C and Vitamin A protects your white blood cells from oxidative damage.
  • Three, Zinc aids in the production of immune cells, like T-cells, that help ward off illness-inducing threats. 
  • Four, Vitamin D enhances the function of your immune cells. 

As if that wasn’t enough, our Immunity Collagen Peptides also support hair, nails, joints, and gut health.

Ingredients

  • 100% Hydrolyzed Collagen Peptides (Bovine)

The skin is our body’s first line of defence. Collagen peptides play an essential role in a healthy immune system by maintaining normal skin function and reducing inflammation in collagen rich tissues. Hydrolyzed bioactive collagen from grass-fed, pasture-raised bovine. A tailored blend that stimulates type 1, type 2 and type 3 collagen. Combined, these promote healthy hair, skin and nails, improve joint function and support gut health.

  • Vitamin C

Essential for collagen biosynthesis and the formation of collagen fibres within the body. Vitamin C also supports the function of various immune cells and enhances their ability to protect against infection.

  • Zinc

A mineral that is needed for immune cell development and plays an important role in the reduction of inflammatory responses within the body.

  • Vitamin A

An important micronutrient that plays a vital role in maintaining your body’s natural defences against illness and infection. It may also assist with the health of vital organs such as your eyes, lungs, and gut.

  • Vitamin D3

Known to enhance the function of immune cells that may protect the body against pathogens.

  • Natural Flavours, Erythritol, Citric Acid, Malic Acid, Natural Colour (Red Beetroot Extract, Spirulina Extract) Natural Sweetener (Thaumatin).

 

Nutrition Information

Vitamin and mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet. Not suitable for persons under 15 years of age. If you have a medical condition, are pregnant or considering becoming pregnant, do not take Vitamin A supplements without consulting your doctor or health professional.

 

How to Use

Blend 1 serving (2 scoops) of Immunity Collagen Peptides into 300-350ml water. Add powder first for best mixability.

1-2 servings per day. Take one serving at a time, at the first sign of common cold symptoms. Do not exceed recommended daily dose. 

Storage: Store in a cool, dark place out of direct sunlight.

entry.title: Mixed Flavours Collagen Sachets - 270g
entry.summary:
Vendor: thecollagen.co
Type:
Price: 49.00

Description

There are 14 sachets in the Mixed Collagen Sachet box - 2 Unflavoured, 3 Passionfruit Mango, 3 Strawberry Watermelon, 3 Mixed Berry and 3 Purple Grape. No matter which tantalising flavour ends up in your favourite foods and beverages, you’re sure to experience the same inside-out, on-the-go, glow-up effects every time.

That’s because they contain the same potent, anti-ageing ingredients: Hydrolysed Bovine Collagen Powder, Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, and Biotin.

Benefits

Catering to all your beauty and wellness needs is a scientifically formulated, potent mix of youth-promoting ingredients. 15 grams of 100% pure, grass-fed, and pasture-raised Hydrolysed Bovine Collagen Peptides are just the start.

These fast-absorbing collagen peptides quickly revive and rescue compromised skin, hair, nails, joints, and gut — so you look, feel, and move as good as new.

You'll also find:

  • Vitamin C, a free radical-fighting antioxidant that promotes a firm, radiant complexion

  • Biotin, a vitamin that aids energy metabolism, encouraging healthy skin, hair, and nails (it truly puts the 'B' in Beauty!)

Ingredients

Unflavoured

  • 100% Hydrolyzed Collagen Peptides (Bovine)

Hydrolyzed bioactive collagen from grass-fed, pasture-raised bovine. A tailored blend that stimulates type 1, type 2 and type 3 collagen. Combined, these promote healthy hair, skin and nails, improve joint function and support gut health.

  • Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C)

Essential for collagen biosynthesis and the formation of collagen fibres. Vitamin C is also a powerful antioxidant that boosts the immune system and helps the body absorb iron.

  • Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid)

A polysaccharide that occurs naturally in your skin. Hyaluronic Acid acts like a tiny sponge that pulls in water to quench and plump skin–giving it that dewy, glowy effect. It also keeps the joints lubricated and helps preserve bone strength.

  • Biotin (Vitamin B7)

An essential B vitamin that assists skin, hair and nail health. Biotin also helps the body convert food into energy by supporting enzymes involved in the breakdown of carbs, fats and proteins.

Passionfruit Mango

  • 100% Hydrolyzed Collagen Peptides (Bovine)
  • Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C)
  • Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid)
  • Biotin (Vitamin B7)
  • Erythritol, Natural Flavours, Malic Acid, Citric Acid, Natural Colours (Red Beetroot Extract, Turmeric Powder), Natural Sweetener (Thaumatin).

Strawberry Watermelon

  • 100% Hydrolyzed Collagen Peptides (Bovine)
  • Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C)
  • Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid)
  • Biotin (Vitamin B7)
  • Erythritol, Natural Flavours, Malic Acid, Citric Acid, Natural Colour (Red Beetroot Extract), Natural Sweetener (Thaumatin).

Mixed Berry

  • 100% Hydrolyzed Collagen Peptides (Bovine)
  • Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C)
  • Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid)
  • Biotin (Vitamin B7)
  • Erythritol, Natural Flavours, Malic Acid, Citric Acid, Natural Colours (Red Beetroot Extract, Spirulina Extract), Natural Sweetener (Thaumatin).

    Purple Grape

    • 100% Hydrolyzed Collagen Peptides (Bovine)
    • Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C)
    • Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid)
    • Biotin (Vitamin B7)
    • Erythritol, Natural Flavours, Malic Acid, Citric Acid, Natural Colour (Spirulina Extract, Red Beetroot Extract), Natural Sweetener (Thaumatin).

    Nutrition Information

    Unflavoured
    Serving Size: 1 serving (15g/0.53oz) Amount per serving: Energy 227kj (54cal), Protein 13.5g (Collagen Peptides 15,000mg), Fat total 0g, Saturated 0g, Carbohydrate 0g, Sugars 0g, Sodium 16mg, Hyaluronic Acid 50mg, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) 80mg, Vitamin B7 (Bitoin) 50mcg

    Passionfruit Mango
    Serving Size: 1 serving (20g/0.71oz) Amount per serving: Energy 275kj (66cal), Protein 13.5g (Collagen Peptides 15,000mg), Fat total 0g, Saturated 0g, Carbohydrate 3.5g, Sugars 0.2g, Erythritol 2g, Sodium 16mg, Hyaluronic Acid 50mg, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) 80mg, Vitamin B7 (Biotin) 50mcg

    Strawberry Watermelon
    Serving Size: 1 serving (20g/0.71oz) Amount per serving: Energy 275kj (66cal), Protein 13.5g (Collagen Peptides 15,000mg), Fat total 0g, Saturated 0g, Carbohydrate 3.5g, Sugars 0.7g, Erythritol 2g, Sodium 17mg, Hyaluronic Acid 50mg, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) 80mg, Vitamin B7 (Biotin) 50mcg

    Mixed Berry
    Serving Size: 1 serving (20g/0.71oz) Amount per serving: Energy 260kj (63cal), Protein 13.5g (Collagen Peptides 15,000mg), Fat total 0g, Saturated 0g, Carbohydrate 3.4g, Sugars 0.9g, Erythritol 2g, Sodium 16mg, Hyaluronic Acid 50mg, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) 80mg, Vitamin B7 (Biotin) 50mcg

    Purple Grape
    Serving Size: 1 serving (20g/0.71oz) Amount per serving: Energy 266kj (64cal), Protein 13.5g (Collagen Peptides 15,000mg), Fat total 0g, Saturated 0g, Carbohydrate 3.7g, Sugars 0.2g, Erythritol 2g, Sodium 16mg, Hyaluronic Acid 50mg, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) 80mg, Vitamin B7 (Biotin) 50mcg

     

    Amino Acid Profile

     

    How to Use

    How to enjoy it?

    Unflavoured
    Blend 1 serving of Premium Collagen Peptides into food/beverage of your choice (hot or cold liquids). Free of any flavour, the original collagen powder can be added to just about anything. We recommend Coffee, Tea, Juice, Yoghurt, Smoothies, Protein Shakes, Oats or in Baked Goods.

    Strawberry Watermelon, Passionfruit Mango, Mixed Berry & Purple Grape
    Blend 1 serving of Premium Collagen Peptides into 400mls of water; or food/beverage of your choice (hot or cold liquids). If substituting water for another beverage or food we recommend Juice, Yoghurt, Smoothies, Protein Shakes, Oats or in cooking Baked goods.

    How many serves a day?
    How much collagen you should take each day depends on your own health goals. Between 15-30grams of collagen peptides a day will give you visible results.

    One serve a day is ideal if you want to combat fine lines and wrinkles, improve your hair and nail strength, ease joint pain, build muscle, improve gut health and get an overall energy boost.

    Two serves a day will fast track your results. Have one serve morning and evening.

    Storage: Store in a cool, dark place out of direct sunlight.

    Common FAQs

    Is collagen safe for pregnant and nursing mothers?

    Yes, our collagen is perfectly safe for both pregnant and nursing mothers. In fact, there are many benefits of taking collagen whilst pregnant. Many of our customers have already experienced the benefits with skin elasticity, minimising the appearance of stretch marks and getting a radiant glow. Additionally, it promotes strong and healthy hair, already helping our customers to combat postpartum hair loss.

    For any specific concerns, we recommend consulting with your general practitioner, who can provide personalised advice tailored to your needs.

    How many serves per pack?

    Our Premium Collagen Peptides sachet boxes are carefully curated to provide 14 servings in compact and portable individual sachets, allowing you to radiate with beauty wherever life takes you. Prepare to be amazed as each serving boasts an astonishing 15 grams of collagen, complemented by the nourishing benefits of Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin C, and Biotin. With this all-inclusive formula, you'll have everything you need to elevate your beauty routine and nurture your inner glow from within.

    How much sugar per serve?

    Indulge guilt-free in our Premium Collagen Peptides and our entire product range, as each serving is thoughtfully crafted to contain minimal to no sugar. Enjoy the delicious flavours of our Premium Collagen Peptides, knowing that each one contains less than 1g of sugar per serving, allowing you to prioritise your health and wellness without sacrificing taste.

entry.title: Strawberry Watermelon Collagen Powder - 560g
entry.summary:
Vendor: thecollagen.co
Type:
Price: 79.00

 

Description

It tastes ridiculously good… like the perfect ice-cold, juicy strawberry and watermelon drink on a hot summer day (ahhh). But that’s not all. 

Our Premium Collagen Peptides are also bursting with anti-ageing goodness — Hydrolysed Bovine Collagen Powder, Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, and Biotin — that’ll seriously please your hair, skin, nails, joints, and gut. *Scoop included.

Benefits

Consider all your beauty and wellness needs taken care of. 

With 15 grams of heavy-hitting Hydrolysed Bovine Collagen Peptides per serving, our collagen powder — pure, 100% grass-fed, and pasture-raised — is not here to mess around. 

Scientifically formulated for fast absorption, our Premium Collagen Peptides work quickly to support hair, nail, and skin health; improve joint function; and nourish the gut.

Other youth-preserving ingredients include: 

  • Vitamin C (adored for its ability to boost natural collagen production)
  • Hyaluronic Acid (a humectant that attracts and retains moisture for joint lubrication and plumped-up skin)
  • Biotin (a B vitamin crucial for energy production and, thus, healthy hair, skin, and nails)

Ingredients

  • 100% Hydrolyzed Collagen Peptides (Bovine)

Hydrolyzed bioactive collagen from grass-fed, pasture-raised bovine. A tailored blend that stimulates type 1, type 2 and type 3 collagen. Combined, these promote healthy hair, skin and nails, improve joint function and support gut health.

  • Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C)

Essential for collagen biosynthesis and the formation of collagen fibres. Vitamin C is also a powerful antioxidant that boosts the immune system and helps the body absorb iron. 

  • Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid)

A polysaccharide that occurs naturally in your skin. Hyaluronic Acid acts like a tiny sponge that pulls in water to quench and plump skin–giving it that dewy, glowy effect. It also keeps the joints lubricated and helps preserve bone strength.

  • Biotin  (Vitamin B7)

An essential B vitamin that assists skin, hair and nail health. Biotin also helps the body convert food into energy by supporting enzymes involved in the breakdown of carbs, fats and proteins. 

  • Erythritol, Natural Flavours, Malic Acid, Citric Acid, Natural Colour (Red Beetroot Extract), Natural Sweetener (Thaumatin).

 

Nutrition Information

 

 

Amino Acid Profile

 

How to Use

How to enjoy it?
Add 1 serving (2 heaped scoops) to 400ml hot or cold water, fruit or your favourite smoothie and mix well. Adding the powder first helps the collagen powder to mix in better.

How many serves a day?
How much collagen you should take each day depends on your own health goals. Between 15-30grams of collagen peptides a day will give you visible results.

One serve a day is ideal if you want to combat fine lines and wrinkles, improve your hair and nail strength, ease joint pain, build muscle, improve gut health and get an overall energy boost.

Two serves a day will fast track your results. Have one serve morning and evening.

Storage: Store in a cool, dark place out of direct sunlight.

Common FAQs

Is collagen safe for pregnant and nursing mothers?

Yes, our collagen is perfectly safe for both pregnant and nursing mothers. In fact, there are many benefits of taking collagen whilst pregnant. Many of our customers have already experienced the benefits with skin elasticity, minimising the appearance of stretch marks and getting a radiant glow. Additionally, it promotes strong and healthy hair, already helping our customers to combat postpartum hair loss.

For any specific concerns, we recommend consulting with your general practitioner, who can provide personalised advice tailored to your needs.

How many serves per pack?

Each tin provides 28 servings, equivalent to 56 scoops, ensuring long-lasting use. If you consume once per day it will last you 28 days. Prepare to be amazed as each serving contains an impressive 15 grams of collagen, complemented by the benefits of Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin C, and Biotin. This comprehensive blend offers everything you need to enhance your beauty regimen, providing nourishment and support for radiant skin, hair, and nails, joints and gut health.

How much sugar per serve?

Indulge guilt-free in our Premium Collagen Peptides and our entire product range, as each serving is thoughtfully crafted to contain minimal to no sugar. Enjoy the delicious flavours of our Premium Collagen Peptides, knowing that each one contains less than 1g of sugar per serving, allowing you to prioritise your health and wellness without sacrificing taste.

entry.title: Unflavoured Collagen Powder - 420g
entry.summary:
Vendor: thecollagen.co
Type:
Price: 79.00

Description

Versatility isn’t our Unflavoured Collagen Powder’s only winning trait. There’s also efficacy — thanks to its highly-targeted and generous dosing of Hydrolysed Bovine Collagen Powder, Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, and Biotin. 

With this supercharged blend working to help your hair, skin, nails, joints, and gut get their glow on … premature ageing and “bad” gut bacteria won’t stand a chance. *Scoop included.

Benefits

Your anti-ageing routine made easy. Our Premium Collagen Peptides deliver 15 grams of potent Hydrolysed Bovine Collagen Peptides per serving — revitalising you from head to toe for your healthiest hair, skin, nails, joints, and gut yet. 

More reasons to love our collagen peptides? We can think of 3. One: they’re grass-fed and pasture-raised. Two: they're tiny (less than 2 kDa on average), so they get absorbed and work fast.

Finally: they’re packed with Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, and Biotin:

  • Vitamin C shields your skin from free radicals
  • Hyaluronic Acid binds water for a firm complexion and well-lubricated joints
  • Biotin aids energy production for resilient hair, skin, and nails

Ingredients

  • 100% Hydrolyzed Collagen Peptides (Bovine)

Hydrolyzed bioactive collagen from grass-fed, pasture-raised bovine. A tailored blend that stimulates type 1, type 2 and type 3 collagen. Combined, these promote healthy hair, skin and nails, improve joint function and support gut health.

  • Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C)

Essential for collagen biosynthesis and the formation of collagen fibres. Vitamin C is also a powerful antioxidant that boosts the immune system and helps the body absorb iron. 

  • Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid)

A polysaccharide that occurs naturally in your skin. Hyaluronic Acid acts like a tiny sponge that pulls in water to quench and plump skin–giving it that dewy, glowy effect. It also keeps the joints lubricated and helps preserve bone strength.

  • Biotin (Vitamin B7)

An essential B vitamin that assists skin, hair and nail health. Biotin also helps the body convert food into energy by supporting enzymes involved in the breakdown of carbs, fats and proteins. 

 

Nutrition Information

Amino Acid

 

How to Use

How to enjoy it?

Add 1 serving (2 levelled scoops) to coffee, tea, oats or your favourite smoothie on the daily. Adding the powder first helps the collagen powder to mix in better. Can also be baked into cakes or biscuits for a delicious collagen snack. 


How many serves a day?
How much collagen you should take each day depends on your own health goals. Between 15-30grams of collagen peptides a day will give you visible results.

One serve a day is ideal if you want to combat fine lines and wrinkles, improve your hair and nail strength, ease joint pain, build muscle, improve gut health and get an overall energy boost.

Two serves a day will fast track your results. Have one serve morning and evening.

Storage: Store in a cool, dark place out of direct sunlight.

Common FAQs

Is collagen safe for pregnant and nursing mothers?

Yes, our collagen is perfectly safe for both pregnant and nursing mothers. In fact, there are many benefits of taking collagen whilst pregnant. Many of our customers have already experienced the benefits with skin elasticity, minimising the appearance of stretch marks and getting a radiant glow. Additionally, it promotes strong and healthy hair, already helping our customers to combat postpartum hair loss.

For any specific concerns, we recommend consulting with your general practitioner, who can provide personalised advice tailored to your needs.

How many serves per pack?

Each tin provides 28 servings, equivalent to 56 scoops, ensuring long-lasting use. If you consume once per day it will last you 28 days. Prepare to be amazed as each serving contains an impressive 15 grams of collagen, complemented by the benefits of Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin C, and Biotin. This comprehensive blend offers everything you need to enhance your beauty regimen, providing nourishment and support for radiant skin, hair, and nails, joints and gut health.

How can I enjoy unflavoured collagen?

Discover the boundless versatility of our unflavored Premium Collagen Peptides, designed to seamlessly integrate into any aspect of your day. Effortlessly incorporate it into your routine by adding it to coffee, tea, juice, smoothies, baked goods, or any other creation your heart desires. With its flexibility, our Premium Collagen Peptides effortlessly adapts to your preferences, allowing you to enjoy the benefits in a way that suits your unique taste and lifestyle.
